name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】SPACE for Virtual GHOST【#星街すいせい3周年LIVE】 [Ajwv4ANSSg0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'DRIVE US CRAZY' by Hoshimachi Suisei and her backing band.
MC section where Suisei announces the formation and immediate disbandment of their band 'AIARS'.
Introduction to the final song 'EXPOSE 'Burn out!!!'.

subtitles.original: 世界トレンド1位ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you for the #1 worldwide trending!

subtitles.original: 星街すいせい3周年ライブ、まだまだ盛り上がっていけー！ホロライブー！
subtitles.english:
Hoshimachi Suisei's 3rd Anniversary Live!
Keep the energy up, Hololive!

subtitles.original: Don't wait 何も成さないまま
subtitles.english: Don't wait, without achieving anything

subtitles.original: 勝った気になって さぁ 準備して Such a fool
subtitles.english: Thinking you've won, now get ready, such a fool

subtitles.original: まだまだ終わらせない
subtitles.english: It's not over yet

subtitles.original: Show me now Fasting path ぶっ壊して 叫べ
subtitles.english: Show me now, break that fasting path and shout

subtitles.original: 腹から Sing along 爆上げ Here we go
subtitles.english: Sing along from your gut, let's go crazy!

subtitles.original: Everyday Everynight 中途半端に生きるな
subtitles.english: Every day, every night, don't live half-heartedly

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで いっそな事 Everything
subtitles.english: Until you turn to ash, give it your everything

subtitles.original: 燃え尽きてみろよ Understand?
subtitles.english: Burn yourself out, understand?

subtitles.original: アハハ！愉快痛快 限界に煽れ
subtitles.english: Ahaha! Delightful and thrilling, push to the limit

subtitles.original: 自分自身を あちこち そっちまで Evolution
subtitles.english: Take yourself here, there, and everywhere, Evolution!

subtitles.original: お後がよろしいようで
subtitles.english: That's it for me, folks!

subtitles.original: Shout! Never say never crazy Come on crazy night
subtitles.english: Shout! Never say never crazy, come on crazy night

subtitles.original: ほら Crazy 味わい尽くせ
subtitles.english: Look, it's crazy, savor it all

subtitles.original: 哀しみも人生さ
subtitles.english: Even sorrow is part of life

subtitles.original: Never say never crazy Come on crazy night
subtitles.english: Never say never crazy, come on crazy night

subtitles.original: ほら Crazy Oh make some noise
subtitles.english: Look, it's crazy, oh make some noise!

subtitles.original: Wait... いつか止むのはいつなの？
subtitles.english: Wait... when is the day it finally stops?

subtitles.original: 言い訳 Nonsense ダラダラ乗っかってるな
subtitles.english: Excuses are nonsense, don't just go with the flow

subtitles.original: 飛び出せ Limit さっさと駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Break the limit, run through it quickly

subtitles.original: 本音で Sing along 爆上げ Here we go
subtitles.english: Sing along with your true feelings, let's go crazy!

subtitles.original: Everyday Everynight 目に写る 弱虫
subtitles.english: Every day, every night, the coward in your eyes

subtitles.original: 蹴り飛ばして 常識ごと 頭ひっくり返せよ Understand?
subtitles.english:
Kick them away, flip your common sense upside down!
Understand?

subtitles.original: オーライ 縦横無尽 自由自在の 自己主張
subtitles.english: Alright, running wild and free with self-assertion

subtitles.original: グッとウルサイ 際まで 今すぐ Showdown
subtitles.english: Loud as can be, right to the edge, showdown now!

subtitles.original: 意義はお有りですか？ Shout!
subtitles.english: Any objections? Shout!

subtitles.original: Never say never crazy Come on crazy night
subtitles.english: Never say never crazy, come on crazy night

subtitles.original: ほら Crazy 自分らしくしろ
subtitles.english: Look, it's crazy, just be yourself

subtitles.original: 邪魔する奴らは Boo!
subtitles.english: Boo to those who get in the way!

subtitles.original: Never say never crazy Come on crazy night
subtitles.english: Never say never crazy, come on crazy night

subtitles.original: ほら Crazy Oh make some noise
subtitles.english: Look, it's crazy, oh make some noise!

subtitles.original: 世界を包み出すのは
subtitles.english: What begins to envelop the world

subtitles.original: お前の本気の産声だけ
subtitles.english: is only your first true cry

subtitles.original: 一瞬きりなら 後悔せず生き抜け
subtitles.english: If it's only for a moment, live it without regret

subtitles.original: Never say never crazy Come on crazy night
subtitles.english: Never say never crazy, come on crazy night

subtitles.original: ほら Crazy 味わい尽くせ
subtitles.english: Look, it's crazy, savor it all

subtitles.original: 哀しみも人生さ
subtitles.english: Even sorrow is part of life

subtitles.original: Never say never crazy Come on crazy night
subtitles.english: Never say never crazy, come on crazy night

subtitles.original: ほら Crazy Oh make some noise
subtitles.english: Look, it's crazy, oh make some noise!

subtitles.original: みんな、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone!

subtitles.original: えー、なんと、ホロライブバンド、結成しましたー！
subtitles.english:
Well, believe it or not,
we've formed a Hololive band!

subtitles.original: それが私たち、「AIARS（アイアーズ）」！
subtitles.english: And we are "AIARS"!

subtitles.original: なんでAIARSなんだい！？
subtitles.english: Why AIARS?!

subtitles.original: はい、AIARS結成しましたが、なんと、
subtitles.english: Yes, we formed AIARS, but...

subtitles.original: 次の曲で、解散となりまーす！
subtitles.english: we're disbanding after the next song!

subtitles.original: えーーー！？今聞いたばっかりだよ！？早すぎるよ！
subtitles.english:
What?! We just heard about it!
That's way too fast!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、最後の曲聴いてください。EXPOSE 'Burn out!!!'
subtitles.english:
Alright, so please listen to our last song.
EXPOSE 'Burn out!!!'

subtitles.original: いっくよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がっていけー！
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped!

subtitles.original: 頭、頭振って飛ばせー！ぶっ飛べー！
subtitles.english:
Headbang, keep those heads moving!
Let's blow it away!

subtitles.original: EXPOSE 'Burn out!!!'
subtitles.english: EXPOSE 'Burn out!!!'
